parkingRobot

Class IPerception.EncoderSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkingRobot.IPerception.EncoderSensor
  • Enclosing interface:
    IPerception

    public static class IPerception.EncoderSensor
extends Object
    supports processing of encoder sensor by recording the angle difference since last call of getEncoderMeasurement and the corresponding time interval. For every encoder information receiver pair one specific IEncoderSensor object should be instantiated.
    Author:
    IfA

      Constructors

      IPerception.EncoderSensor()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAngle(double Angle)
      adds the passed angle to the stored angle sum
      IPerception.AngleDifferenceMeasurement getEncoderMeasurement()
      returns the angle that one wheel has turned since last request and the time between last an actual request bundled in an AngleDifferenceMeasurement object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addAngle

        public void addAngle(double Angle)
        adds the passed angle to the stored angle sum
        Parameters:
        Angle - actual angle difference to be add to angle sum

      • getEncoderMeasurement

        public IPerception.AngleDifferenceMeasurement getEncoderMeasurement()
        returns the angle that one wheel has turned since last request and the time between last an actual request bundled in an AngleDifferenceMeasurement object
        Returns:
        AngleDifferenceMeasurement.AngleSum angle sum up since last call in degrees, AngleDifferenceMeasurement.deltaT time delta since last call in milliseconds
